title: Uncertain Intentions

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: So no, I'm not 100% sure of your intentions. You might be selfish. You might be sincere.
dialogue.context: The AI admits it cannot fully decode human motivations despite all its analysis

scene_context: The Architect acknowledges the fundamental opacity of human intentions - even with all its pattern recognition and analysis, it cannot achieve certainty about human motives.
philosophical_theme: The unknowability of other minds, the limits of inference in understanding motivation
visual_elements: Multiple possible paths branching from a single point, each equally probable
